title: Recommended Partner
description: This badge is awarded at our discretion and can not be bought, it is bestowed upon a business we actively trust, value and recommend based on quality, reliability, and alignment with our standards.

title: Editor's Choice
description: Selected by our editorial team as a standout option in its category, based on overall performance, usability, and value for brokers.

title: Premium Listing
description: A listing that includes richer profile content, and priority placement across the directory.

title: Featured Tool
description: Highlighted for its relevance, momentum, or usefulness within the current broker ecosystem. It is usually a frequently recommended tool or service by brokers within our community.

title: Loved by Auctus Coaching
description: A business personally used, trusted, and valued by the Auctus Coaching team through real-world experience and collaboration. This label reflects genuine affinity, not a paid placement.
